text: Abdullahi Yusuf Ahmed (15 December 1934 â€“ 23 March 2012) was a Somali politician and former military officer. He was one of the founders of the rebel Somali Salvation Democratic Front (SSDF) as well as the Puntland state of Somalia. He was the President of Somalia from 2004 until 2008. Yusuf died in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates on 23 March 2012 from problems caused by pneumonia at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Colonels Category:Presidents of Somalia
title: Abdullahi Yusuf Ahmed
